Package chess

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessPiece
  • public class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a chess piece in the game of chess. A piece has a owner and has a specific chess Symbol such as King, queen, pawn etc.
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Player owner
      owner of the piece.

      symbol of the piece.
